allow: Bash(for file in pipo-charachip019.png pipo-halloweenchara2016_02.png pipo-halloweenchara2016_23.png pipo-halloweenchara2016_13.png pipo-halloweenchara2016_10.png)

Bash(.venv/bin/python3 -c "
from PIL import Image
img = Image.open(''scenes/enemies/$file'')
print(f''Size: {img.size}'')
print(f''Mode: {img.mode}'')
width, height = img.size
print(f''Grid (32x32): {width//32}x{height//32}'')
print(f''Grid (48x48): {width//48}x{height//48}'')
")
